name: Finger Hole
description:
The exciting world of high stakes gambling game. The exciting world of finger holing is now on your Gameboy! Build up your net worth, navigate holes. Use your finger. This game has it all! 

Use your control pad to place your bets! Use the (Z ,X )keyboard keys  to confirm your bets. X is the A key, Z is the B key it's a little confusing cause there is a visual X next to the B key on screen. I guess that only ads to the gaming challenge!
